title: [Neuroscience] A new study reveals astrocyte dysfunction (an accumulation of a protein called TDP-43) may be a driver of cognitive decline and memory loss in those with dementia

[Health] In a study on adults with type 2 diabetes, sugar sweetened beverage intake was associated with a higher risk of incident CVD and CVD mortality. Significant inverse associations were observed between intake of coffee and low fat milk and CVD incidence.
